name: Climate and Forecast Metadata Conventions
description: Conventions for climate and forecast data stored in netCDF files

name: Network Common Data Form
description: Set of software libraries and self-describing, machine-independent data formats for array-oriented scientific data

name: Web Map Service
description: Standard protocol for serving georeferenced map images over the Internet

name: Web Feature Service
description: Web service that allows querying and retrieval of geographical features
